metadata.title: CVE-2021-35517 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: When reading a specially crafted TAR archive, Compress can be made toallocate large amounts of memory that finally leads to an out of memoryerror even for very small inputs. This could be used to mount a denial ofservice attack against services that use Compress' tar package.

criterions.comment: libcommons-compress-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
